CN.content:

Paragraph: THF and toluene were distilled from sodium benzophenone under nitrogen prior to use.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

2. toluene (Methylbenzene)
3. sodium benzophenone (NaC6H5CH3)

So, the three material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

2. toluene
3. sodium benzophenone

PV.content:

Paragraph: THF and toluene were distilled from sodium benzophenone under nitrogen prior to use.

2. toluene (Methylbenzene) - a chemical compound with the molecular formula C6H5CH3.
3. sodium benzophenone - a chemical compound with the molecular formula C11H10O.

These entities are identified as "Property Value" entities because they represent the properties of the chemical compounds being described in the paragraph, such as their chemical formula and molecular structure.
